Body:
x = np.linspace(-100, 100, 1000)
y = 1000 * np.exp(-x ** 2 / (2 * 20 ** 2)) + 200 * np.exp(-(x + 99) ** 2 /
    (2 * 1 ** 2))
als = AlsCvxopt(smoothness_param=100.0, asym_param=0.001, redux=1,
    fix_end_points=False, fix_rng=None, verbose=True)
y_als = als.calculate(y)
assert y[0] - y_als[0] > 20
als = AlsCvxopt(smoothness_param=10.0, asym_param=0.001, redux=1,
    fix_end_points=True, fix_rng=None, verbose=True)
y_als = als.calculate(y)
assert y[0] - y_als[0] < 2
